content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the environment using the command ". /root/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate && echo 'Environment activated.'" but received an error message stating that the source command could not be found. The command returned STDOUT: b'' and STDERR: b'/bin/sh: 1: .: cannot open /root/miniconda3/bin/activate: No such file\n'.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": ". /root/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: .: cannot open /root/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh: No such file\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": ". /root/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: .: cannot open /root/miniconda3/bin/activate: No such file\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": ". /opt/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: .: cannot open /opt/miniconda3/bin/activate: No such file\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
